text: 4.9 Lom 8.36, 1 Ko 15.30-31, 2 Ko 6.9, Hib 10.33 Yad anɨgɨl gos nepin, chɨn bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb okok, God chɨnop dɨ kɨdek okdaŋ lup. Chɨnop aglɨl, pak lɨnɨg nag lɨpal tek mɨdobun. Anɨgek, binɨb okok ayɨp ensel okok ayɨp, lum awl mɨdebal okok mɨdupsek, chɨnop nɨŋɨd, bɨ yokɨp tek lek paklel mɨdebal tek agɨl gos nepal.
